Basically, a mission type order needs to cover only three
important things.
One, it should clearly state what the commander
issuing the order wants to have accomplished.
That's number one.
This is what you need to accomplish.
Number two, it should point out the limiting
or control factors that must be observed
for coordinating factors.

You can't fly over this region.
You can't enter into this zone.
Here's the limitations.

and the support which he can expect or count on
from sources outside of his command.
